name: Sakura Strawberry Latte
description: A caffeine-free drink with fresh strawberries, milk, and sakura cherry blossom syrup.

name: Cold Brew Coffee
description: A concentrated coffee made with coffee beans and cooled water.

name: Hojicha Hot Chocolate
description: A blend of roasted green tea (hojicha) and hot chocolate with low caffeine.

name: Earl Grey Waffles with Mixed Berries
description: A tea-infused waffle batter served with mixed berries.

name: Waffle Turkey Sandwich
description: Two buttermilk waffles with slices of turkey deli meat, mixed greens, and an egg. Also comes with tater tots.

name: Classic Glazed Donut
description: A donut with a simple vanilla glaze.

name: Banana Miso White Chocolate Donut
description: A donut that combines the richness of banana, Japanese miso, and white chocolate.

name: Lychee Rose Donut
description: A donut infused with rose water and lychee flavor.

name: Gianduja
description: One 8 oz. jar of dark chococlate hazelnut spread.

name: Strawberry Earl Grey Jam
description: One 8 oz. jar of strawberry jam infused with Earl Grey tea.

name: Artisan-style Loaf
description: A loaf of bread with a crisp exterior and soft, chewy texture.

name: Sourdough Bread
description: A loaf of bread with a tangy flavor and slightly chewy texture.
